## Government Tender Announcement 
### Reference: WS4385658998 – Solicitation for Leopard 2 Tank Transmissions

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is soliciting proposals for the supply of five (5) transmissions with five (5) shipping containers for the Leopard 2 Family of Vehicles.

##### Key Tender Details
* **Tender Closing Date:** 17 May 2024, 14:00:00 EDT
* **Place of Delivery:** Montreal, Canada

##### Trade Agreements and Eligibility
This tender is open to all eligible bidders subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

##### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of lowest price.

##### Important Notice
 Amendment to closing time: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 17 May 2024, 14:00:00 EDT. 

#### Contact Information
For more information regarding this solicitation, please contact Andrew Aleinik of SPAC/PSPC at andrew.aleinik@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

# Government Tender Documents
Please find the tender documents at the Ariba Discovery website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19020472?extsite=MTkwMjA0NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
